name: 千雪
text:
わぁ
甘奈ちゃん、可愛い……！
trans:
Wow...
You're so cute, Amana-chan...!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……なーちゃん、可愛い……
全部、似合うね……
trans:
Yeah... Naa-chan's so pretty...
Everything, looks good on her...

name: 甘奈
text:
ありがとー！　千雪さん、甜花ちゃん☆
この雑誌の撮影、めっちゃ気合い入れてたんだ～
trans:
Thank you! Chiyuki-san, Tenka-chan☆
I put a lot of effort into the photoshoot for this magazine~

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃんらしいなぁ
trans: It's just like you to do that, Amana-chan.

name: 千雪
text:
『夏らしいファッションで揃えてみました』──
うん、コンセプトもちゃんと伝わる
trans:
『A Feature on Summerlike Fashion』ー
The concept for this issue really came through.

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、褒められちゃった☆
trans: Ehehe, I'm being praised☆

name: 甜花
text: ──『日焼け対策はいつも念入りに』……
trans: ──『Always thorough with her sunburn preparations』...

name: 千雪
text: うん、えらいなぁ……！
trans: Mhm, that's admirable...!

name: 甘奈
text:
日焼け対策のこと
めっちゃ話しちゃった☆
trans:
I talked a lot about
how to protect yourself from sunburns☆

name: 甜花
text:
うん……なーちゃん……
日焼け止め、色々持ってたり、すごい……
trans:
That's right... Naa-chan...
Brings a lot of things, like sunscreens... It's amazing...

name: 甘奈
text: 紫外線は一年中あるからね！
trans: Ultraviolet rays are always present, after all!

name: 甜花
text:
甜花も……なーちゃんにもらうこと、ある……
サプリみたいな……飲むやつとか……
trans:
Naa-chan... gave Tenka stuff for that too...
Things like... supplements to drink and others...

name: 甘奈
text: 普段からケアするのに便利だもんね～
trans: It's convenient for personal care routines, after all~

name: 甘奈
text:
あ！　そうだ！
千雪さんの対策、聞いてみたい！
trans:
Ah! That reminds me!
I want to hear about your own countermeasures, Chiyuki-san!

name: 千雪
text: ええっ、私……？
trans: What? Me...?

name: 千雪
text:
その……私は全然、大したことないの
なんとなく、素材はハーブのものがいいかなってくらい
trans:
Uhm... I don't really do anything special.
I just use some herbs that I think are good one way or another.

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃんみたいに色々持ってるわけじゃないんだけど、
肌には合ってる気がするから
trans:
I don't have a wide selection of things like you do,
but it's because I think what I do is enough for my skin.

name: 甘奈
text:
ハーブなんだ～！
千雪さんの優しいイメージにピッタリ☆
trans:
So it is herbs~!
It does fit your gentle image☆

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、ハーブって優しいぶん
季節によってはお肌、守り切れなかったりするかも……
trans:
But I think that the gentleness of herbs
might not be enough for your skin, especially across seasons...

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈も自然素材のはちょっと詳しくないけど……
trans: Not that Amana's well-informed about natural products though...

name: 千雪
text: あ、紫外線の量も違うんだもんね
trans: Ah, it's because the amount of ultraviolet rays changes, right?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、だから
千雪さんも使い分け、してみてもいいのかなぁって
trans:
Yup, that's why I think
it would be nice if you would also try out alternatives.

name: 甘奈
text:
もちろん、今のでも大丈夫かもしれないけど
もっと合うの、あるかもだから
trans:
Of course, I think you're okay right now but
I think there's something that would fit you more.

name: 千雪
text:
うん
甘奈ちゃんにアドバイスしてもらえるの、頼もしい……！
trans:
Mhm.
It's reassuring, being given advice from you...!

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんの日焼け止め……
よく効く……
trans:
Naa-chan's recommendations...
Work really well...

name: 千雪
text:
そうなの？
それじゃ、使い分けが効いてるのね、きっと
trans:
Is that so?
In that case, I'm sure the alternative she'll suggest will work well too.

name: 千雪
text: 私にもおすすめを教えてほしいな……！
trans: I can't wait to hear what you'll be recommending me...!

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ、今度お店行ってみよっか！
実物を見ながら選んだ方が良さそう！
trans:
Well then, why don't we try going to a store next time?
It's easier to choose when we can see it!

name: 千雪
text: わ、嬉しい……！
trans: Wow, that makes me happy...!

name: 千雪
text: 私、つい慣れてるものばっかり使っちゃうから──
trans: You see, I've only really been using stuff that I'm used to.

name: 甘奈
text: 新しいものってたまに失敗しちゃうもんね～
trans: It's because trying out new things doesn't always work out, right~?

name: 甘奈
text:
買った後で、なんか違う～って
思っちゃったり
trans:
Like after buying it, you suddenly think that
it feels a bit different from before.

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ
私も使わないのに買っちゃったりするかも
trans:
Fufu.
Sometimes I also end up buying stuff I never use.

name: 甘奈
text:
なんでこれ買ったの？
ってその時の自分に聞きたくなるよね～
trans:
Those moments where you end up asking yourself,
"Why did I even buy this?", right~?

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、新しいの買うたびに、
すっごく楽しくなっちゃう！
trans:
But to be honest, it's really fun
whenever you get to buy new things!

name: 甘奈
text: 確かに失敗しちゃうこともあるけど……
trans: I'm sure it won't always work out, but...

name: 甘奈
text:
パッケージかわいーとか、お肌に合うといいな～とか
考えながらお買い物してるとワクワクしちゃって──！
trans:
Shopping is always so exciting whenever I think about how cute 
the package is, or how nice it would be if it worked well on my skin!

name: 甘奈
text: だから、千雪さんもどうかなぁって……！
trans: That's why I'm curious about how it would be for you...!

name: 甘奈
text: どうしたの？
trans: What's wrong?

name: 千雪
text:
……うん、すっごく素敵
新しい挑戦って、ワクワクすることだよね……！
trans:
...Yeah, it sounds wonderful.
Challenging yourself with something new is pretty exciting, huh...!

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん……？
trans: Chiyuki-san...?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、いいかも
私も新しい日焼け止めに挑戦します……！
trans:
Fufu, I think it sounds great.
I want to challenge myself with a new sunscreen too...!

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、ぴったりのやつ、見つけようね☆
trans: Ehehe, let's find you one that fits you perfectly, okay☆

name: 甜花
text:
それなら、甜花も……
日焼け止め……ほしい、かも……！
trans:
In that case, Tenka...
wants to try... a new sunscreen too...!

name: 甘奈
text: ホント！？
trans: Really!?

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！
trans: Y-Yeah...!

name: 甜花
text:
夏だから……
甜花も、自分の欲しいなって……挑戦……！
trans:
It's summer...
That's why Tenka... wants to challenge herself too...!

name: 千雪
text: わ、じゃあ３人で買いに行こっか……？
trans: Wow, then should all three of us go shopping together...?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……！
みんなで……お買い物……！
trans:
Yeah...!
Let's go shopping... together...!

name: 甘奈
text: オフが待ち遠しいな～
trans: I can't wait for our day off~
